channel.title: Area 51 | 50+ | 24/7 | Upgraded Weapons | Killstreaks | 100% Revs
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/2h4f3bp.jpg[/img][/center]
[center]Website http://www.Area51-Rsps.com[/center]
[center][b]Having problems with the client? CONTACT ME -Skype - clarkeyy1[/b]
[b]Client -[/b] http://www.mediafire.com/?db31b9c0jm1xdoe
[b]-Server-[/b] We are a Pk/Eco/Pvm Server, you start out with some cash to spend in our shops, and some tokens to either grab yourself a little pvp item, or you can save it for future investment, when you get more pk tokens. It's upto you, you can either gear up and go pk, which you will earn tokens, cash + dung xp, or you can go to moneymaking area, and start making some cash to pk with! Or even better you can take a vist to some of our fun and enjoyable Bosses, Such as Copr, Kbd, Bandos, Armadyl or if you're feeling lucky try our newly devloped Rev Cave! for them Vesta or statius items ;)
[b]-Server Version-[/b] 667 loading 714 Cache.
[b]-Hosting-[/b] We're currently VPS Hosted so this server is 24/7
[b]-Custom Features-[/b] ➜Killstreaks ➜Killstreak Rewards ➜Killstreak Capes 10-90 ➜TokHaar-Kal Fully Added ➜Safe Pvp ➜News ➜Weekly Polls ➜Random Pvp Drops ➜Dicing with a new DiceZone ➜KillStreak Ranks Table Added ➜Upgradable Weapons! - Flower game!
[IMG]http://i696.photobucket.com/albums/vv327/oz_vengance/flowergame.jpg[/img]
[b]-PvM-[/b] For you PvM lovers we have added enough bosses so you won't get bored such as.. ➜Armadyl ➜Bandos ➜Saradomin ➜Corporal Beast ➜King Black Dragon ➜Revenants - With the cave.[/center]
[center]Proof of 100% Revenants:[/center]
[center][IMG]http://i696.photobucket.com/albums/vv327/oz_vengance/rev3.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i696.photobucket.com/albums/vv327/oz_vengance/rev4.jpg[/img][/center]
[center] [URL=http://flgc.info/LEwFHy][IMG]http://s09.flagcounter.com/count/72BY/bg_FFFFFF/txt_000000/border_CCCCCC/columns_3/maxflags_30/viewers_0/labels_0/pageviews_0/flags_0/[/img][/URL][/center]
[center] [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/2zgdh7n.png[/img][/center]

Or even better you can take a vist
